page.title: 02Unemployment
page.content: The area suffers the effects of high unemployment. Mnay of the big employers in the area, such as I.C.I.,British Steel, the shipping industrries have made people redundant.Many fathers now work on the Oil fields being at home for 2weeks and away for 2 weeks.This affects home life. Asurvey conducted in Thorntree showed that out of a potential work force of 328, 163 were employed whilst 165 were unemployed. This is not an encouraging future for children leaving school,many have to leave the area for work or sign on the 'dole'. Maybe the problems discussed on the following pages are partly a result of this situation.
